title: Bug splat
body: Every time i get into game (So i load in after champ select) i wait about 4 seconds buying items and then my game gets a bug splat and goes to the reconnect screen this is when playing any game type. can any one help me?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try [repairing your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) for me, let me know if this helps.
Hi sorry for late response i tried that but did not work so. i have just system restarted my pc. thank for the help any way.
